description:
April 13, 2017 / Addendum host D. Watkins is joined by Undisclosed: The Killing of Freddie Gray host Marcia Chatelain, as well as guest panelists Adam Jackson and Scott Goldman.
 
Episode scoring music by Patrick Cortes, Ramiro Marquez, Blue Dot Sessions, and FMG Dez.
